Arginine-based acid retardation
C09K 8/74; C09K 8/602; E21B 43/27
Single-phase aqueous fluid; strong acid (7.5-28 wt %); arginine (1:100 to 1:5 molar ratio); surfactants (EADB, CAPB, CTAB).
Balances reaction rates to ensure deeper formation penetration and provides less corrosive flowback, protecting surface equipment.

Sep. 30, 2025
FUNCTIONALIZED NANOPARTICLES AS WETABILITY MODIFIER
Valerie Gisele Helene Lafitte, Juan David Estrada Benavides
Subterranean formation stimulation
Janus cellulosic nanoparticles for wettability modification
C09K 8/90; E21B 43/26
Cellulosic nanoparticles (nanocellulose); hydrophilic ligands (PAM, PEG); hydrophobic ligands; Janus particle configuration.
Enhances relative permeability of oil versus water by lubricating flow passages or blocking water fronts, improving hydrocarbon recovery.
